section.p: Segmentation is the basic part of the analysis. You activate it implicitly when you select Open for a document that has not yet been analyzed. documentopening

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p: The folder containing the document must be opened.

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p:
Select:
The document to analyze from the Document List window of the folder
Open from the File menu
Alternatively, double-click the document in the Document List window.
This takes you to the where the analyzed document is displayed in the Translation window.

section.title: Results
section.p: The document is segmented. You can start to translate it (see ).
